name: Doodle Attack
description:
You are a stickman that lives in a small room, suddenly, your peace gets interrupted by a whole non-stopping wave of doodles that want to attack you!

Simple game, just shoot fireballs to them and avoid getting 4 hits or your flashlight will run off.

More content for this game may come soon, that includes:
- More enemies
- Bug fixes and enhancements.
